original_text: And the governors of Judah shall say in their heart, The inhabitants of Jerusalem shall be my strength in the Lord of hosts their God.
korean_text: 유다의 우두머리들이 마음속에 이르기를 예루살렘 주민이 그들의 하나님 만군의 여호와로 말미암아 힘을 얻었다 할지라

sentences.original_text: And governors of Judah shall say in their heart
The inhabitants of Jerusalem shall be my strength
in the Lord of hosts their God
